job_title: Research Staff in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
pros:
Overall a nice place to work, with good atmosphere, great location and low costs of living. 

+ Location
+ Atmosphere in laboratory
+ Flexible hours
+ Good salary
cons:
You are on your own, very little guidence, small group of collegues and practically no chance of being permanently hired.
- Too many meetings
- Small work groups
- No posibility of permanent contract
- Periods of very hard work and periods of very little work

job_title: Assistant Professor in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
pros: As a public institution, employees enjoy job security and good working conditions. Additionally, lecturers have a great autonomy for carry out their tasks
cons: Pubic universities choose their rectors. In turn rectors choose their excecutive team. This practice can have bad consequences. ULPGC has had a really bad managers team the last years. The have implemented several practices that do not recognize excellent employees' perfomance. Instead current practices appreciate mediocre actuations.
